1a1(nyi khri): @#/ /nyi khri ka pa bzhugs so//
1b1(nyi khri): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa bing+sha ti sa ha sri kA
1b2(nyi khri): pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol
1b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ dum bu dang po/
1b4(nyi khri): bam po gcig pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
2a1(nyi khri): @##/ /sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
2a2(nyi khri): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod phung
2a3(nyi khri): po la| dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams
2a4(nyi khri): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems
2a5(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang
2b1(nyi khri): po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs
2b2(nyi khri): su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin
2b3(nyi khri): pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa
2b4(nyi khri): dga' bo'o/ /dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen dang /
2b5(nyi khri): dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b6(nyi khri): tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam
3a1(nyi khri): par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos
3a2(nyi khri): thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i
3a3(nyi khri): spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes
3a4(nyi khri): pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo
3a5(nyi khri): med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grags pa
3a6(nyi khri): dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par
3b1(nyi khri): khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las
3b2(nyi khri): dang nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs
3b3(nyi khri): par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa bskal pa grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan
3b4(nyi khri): pa| sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor
3b5(nyi khri): mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma
3b6(nyi khri): dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud
3b7(nyi khri): pa| sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/
4a1(nyi khri): sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya
4a2(nyi khri): ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ las
4a3(nyi khri): dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la
4a4(nyi khri): zhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa/
4a5(nyi khri): las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag
4a6(nyi khri): tu rgyun mi chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
4a7(nyi khri): mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin
4b1(nyi khri): rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ sems
4b2(nyi khri): can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la
4b3(nyi khri): mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /
4b4(nyi khri): rin chen 'byung gnas dang / rin chen snying po dang / rin chen byin pa dang / ded dpon dam pa dang / skyes bus byin dang / skyob sbed dang / chu bdag lha dang / dbang pos byin dang / bzang
4b5(nyi khri): po'i stobs dang / blo gros dam pa dang / 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / blo gros 'phel ba dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / don yod mthong ba dang / sgrib med blo gros dang / rab tu zhugs
4b6(nyi khri): pa dang | mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / rtag tu brtson pa dang / rtag tu sbyor ba dang / mi gtong brtson pa dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / zla ba'i
4b7(nyi khri): snying po dang / blo gros dpe med pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / mthu chen po thob pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang /
5a1(nyi khri): rdo rje blo gros dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rtag tu lag brkyang dang / snying rje cher sems dang / rgyan chen po dang / rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po
5a2(nyi khri): dang / ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag
5a3(nyi khri): dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyil mo krung
5a4(nyi khri): bcas te bzhugs so/ /de na bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
5a5(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'phrul gyi spyan
5a6(nyi khri): gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong
5a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /zhabs gnyis kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo //
5b1(nyi khri): zhabs kyi long bu gnyis dang / zhabs byin pa gnyis dang / zhabs pus mo gnyis dang / zhabs brla gnyis dang / sku sta zur gnyis dang / sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / sku rtsib logs
5b2(nyi khri): gnyis dang / thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
5b3(nyi khri): brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo / /de bzhin du phyag lag ngar gnyis dang / sku phrag pa gnyis dang / mgur dang / tshems mche ba bzhi dang / tshems bzhi bcu dang / spyan gnyis dang / snyan
5b4(nyi khri): gnyis dang / shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang / steng gi spyi gtsug dang / zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/ 'od
5b5(nyi khri): zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar
5b6(nyi khri): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs
5b7(nyi khri): mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong
6a1(nyi khri): ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pas byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas kyang bcom
6a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /
6a3(nyi khri): shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang /
6a4(nyi khri): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems
6a5(nyi khri): can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas kyang bcom
6a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su
6a7(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs
6b1(nyi khri): mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /
6b2(nyi khri): 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po
6b3(nyi khri): bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'jum pa mdzad do/ /ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od zer kha
6b4(nyi khri): dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad+mo mang po/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/
6b5(nyi khri): sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin+di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad+mo de
6b6(nyi khri): dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs
6b7(nyi khri): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /de dag lho dang /
7a1(nyi khri): nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing
7a2(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas kyang / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /
7a3(nyi khri): sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan
7a4(nyi khri): seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /rdzu 'phrul de mngon
7a5(nyi khri): par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu
7a6(nyi khri): 'gul to/ /kun tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem chem mo/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /
7a7(nyi khri): shig shig/ rab tu shig shig /kun tu shig shig go/ shar mtho na ni nub dma'/ nub mtho na ni shar dma'/ byang mtho na ni lho dma'/ lho mtho na ni byang dma'/ mtha' mtho
7b1(nyi khri): na ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba skyes bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig
7b2(nyi khri): yud tsam thang gcig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang /
7b3(nyi khri): ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang / mi dang skal ba mnyam par skyes
7b4(nyi khri): par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam
7b5(nyi khri): par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha de dag dang / mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang /
7b6(nyi khri): mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
7b7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang /
8a1(nyi khri): phyogs mtshams rnams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams
8a2(nyi khri): cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad
8a3(nyi khri): kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/
8a4(nyi khri): rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
8a5(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag btsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
8a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod
8a7(nyi khri): pa de dag thams cad kyang / mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /sems 'khrugs
8b1(nyi khri): pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to/ /gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur ro/ /dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob
8b2(nyi khri): par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to/ /lus nyams pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang
8b3(nyi khri): zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur te/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang / ngag dang /
8b4(nyi khri): yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la/ dper na/ pha dang / ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza'
8b5(nyi khri): ba dang / gnyen pa dang / grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing
8b6(nyi khri): tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan
8b7(nyi khri): par gyur te/ dper na/ dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa
9a1(nyi khri): 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o/ /zhi ba ni dge ba'o/ /dul ba ni dge ba'o/ /sdom pa ni dge ba'o/ /dben pa ni dge ba'o/ /
9a2(nyi khri): bag byed pa ni dge ba'o/ /byams pa ni dge ba'o/ /snying rje ni dge ba'o/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa ni dge ba'o/ /srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba 'di ni dge ba'o zhes bya
9a3(nyi khri): bar shes par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng+ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la
9a4(nyi khri): 'dug pa'am/ zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/
9a5(nyi khri): dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang / sku
9a6(nyi khri): mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis
9a7(nyi khri): mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
9b1(nyi khri): klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang
9b2(nyi khri): shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/
9b3(nyi khri): 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis
9b4(nyi khri): non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/
9b5(nyi khri): lham ne/ lhang de'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das
9b6(nyi khri): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang /
9b7(nyi khri): gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das
10a1(nyi khri): kyis rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun
10a2(nyi khri): snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed
10a3(nyi khri): pa de thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing
10a4(nyi khri): rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ut+pal
10a5(nyi khri): dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan+d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs
10a6(nyi khri): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
10a7(nyi khri): byug spos dang / ut+pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / na li na dang / sau gan+d+hi dang / me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / rgyan
10b1(nyi khri): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
10b2(nyi khri): gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste
10b3(nyi khri): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma la sogs pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
10b4(nyi khri): mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa
10b5(nyi khri): brtsegs pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du red de gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'phyang
10b6(nyi khri): bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to/ /rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/ /me tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu
10b7(nyi khri): mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
11a1(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab
11a2(nyi khri): cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re
11a3(nyi khri): zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
11a4(nyi khri): pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams
11a5(nyi khri): ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba glang spyod dang / shar gyi lus 'phags po dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar
11a6(nyi khri): dang / de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang / lha thams
11a7(nyi khri): cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston
11b1(nyi khri): to snyam mo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng+ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
11b2(nyi khri): 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
11b3(nyi khri): kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig
11b4(nyi khri): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi
11b5(nyi khri): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems
11b6(nyi khri): can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
11b7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub
12a1(nyi khri): dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
12a2(nyi khri): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
12a3(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong
12a4(nyi khri): bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de
12a5(nyi khri): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
12a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12a7(nyi khri): 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom
12b1(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
12b2(nyi khri): chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
12b3(nyi khri): 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b4(nyi khri): chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig
12b5(nyi khri): rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de
12b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
12b7(nyi khri): chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi
13a1(nyi khri): khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag
13a2(nyi khri): bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa
13a3(nyi khri): rab tu theb pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin
13a4(nyi khri): chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems
13a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs
13a6(nyi khri): kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma
13a7(nyi khri): mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang /
13b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig /rigs kyi bu/
13b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/
13b3(nyi khri): der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
13b4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang /
13b5(nyi khri): khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
13b6(nyi khri): gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs
13b7(nyi khri): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
14a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong
14a2(nyi khri): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
14a3(nyi khri): 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
14a4(nyi khri): chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/
14a5(nyi khri): pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad
14a6(nyi khri): du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag
14a7(nyi khri): gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams
14b1(nyi khri): cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa
14b2(nyi khri): de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang /
14b3(nyi khri): khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14b4(nyi khri): shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
14b5(nyi khri): klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14b6(nyi khri): mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
14b7(nyi khri): ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher
15a1(nyi khri): g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
15a2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
15a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/
15a4(nyi khri): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad
15a5(nyi khri): ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de
15a6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
15a7(nyi khri): po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas bcom ldan
15b1(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
15b2(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal
15b3(nyi khri): cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du
15b4(nyi khri): mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas de bzhin gshegs
15b5(nyi khri): pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang
15b6(nyi khri): ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi
15b7(nyi khri): mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
16a1(nyi khri): pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes gyis la/ pad+mo
16a2(nyi khri): 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16a3(nyi khri): chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
16a4(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
16a5(nyi khri): khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs
16a6(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na
16a7(nyi khri): bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub
16b1(nyi khri): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na
16b2(nyi khri): ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
16b3(nyi khri): chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med
16b4(nyi khri): pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser
16b5(nyi khri): gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas
16b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
16b7(nyi khri): gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha
17a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
17a2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom
17a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs
17a4(nyi khri): gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
17a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
17a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug
17a7(nyi khri): pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
17b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/
17b2(nyi khri): 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
17b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas shar phyogs logs
17b4(nyi khri): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
17b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin
17b6(nyi khri): te| de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to//
17b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de
18a1(nyi khri): blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang
18a2(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de
18a3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang
18a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi
18a5(nyi khri): bu| bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis
18a6(nyi khri): sam| zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom
18a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/
18b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/ der
18b2(nyi khri): nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
18b3(nyi khri): rin chen 'od 'phro de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su
18b4(nyi khri): 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho
18b5(nyi khri): skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag
18b6(nyi khri): gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom
18b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag
19a1(nyi khri): btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
19a2(nyi khri): shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun
19a3(nyi khri): mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
19a4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
19a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
19a6(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin
19a7(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa
19b1(nyi khri): de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
19b2(nyi khri): de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti
19b3(nyi khri): stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
19b4(nyi khri): rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'
19b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas
19b6(nyi khri): byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
19b7(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces
20a1(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu
20a2(nyi khri): gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
20a3(nyi khri): bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
20a4(nyi khri): ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa'
20a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/
20a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das
20a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
20b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab
20b2(nyi khri): tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de
20b3(nyi khri): nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab
20b4(nyi khri): ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das
20b5(nyi khri): snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong
20b6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis
20b7(nyi khri): gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
21a1(nyi khri): ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
21a2(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
21a3(nyi khri): dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs
21a4(nyi khri): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
21a5(nyi khri): na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub
21a6(nyi khri): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
21a7(nyi khri): shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang
21b1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
21b2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' ma/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod
21b3(nyi khri): dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad
21b4(nyi khri): du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs
21b5(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
21b6(nyi khri): mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang /
21b7(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang
22a1(nyi khri): rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas
22a2(nyi khri): so| |bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
22a3(nyi khri): 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge
22a4(nyi khri): 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
22a5(nyi khri): ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen
22a6(nyi khri): po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22a7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal
22b1(nyi khri): de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba
22b2(nyi khri): 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
22b3(nyi khri): chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
22b4(nyi khri): snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
22b5(nyi khri): shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems
22b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to//
22b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de
23a1(nyi khri): blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs
23a2(nyi khri): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan
23a3(nyi khri): 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ //shes rab kyi pha rol tu
23a4(nyi khri): phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam
23a5(nyi khri): par gnon pa la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
23a6(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang
23a7(nyi khri): ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge
23b1(nyi khri): 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod
23b2(nyi khri): par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas
23b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
23b4(nyi khri): rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u
23b5(nyi khri): dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom
23b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang /
23b7(nyi khri): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po
24a1(nyi khri): dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang
24a2(nyi khri): na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
24a3(nyi khri): par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba
24a5(nyi khri): dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po
24a6(nyi khri): dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang
24a7(nyi khri): shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
24b1(nyi khri): gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar
24b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyang
24b3(nyi khri): chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan
24b4(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa byas nas
24b5(nyi khri): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan
24b6(nyi khri): shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/
24b7(nyi khri): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems
25a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na
25a2(nyi khri): chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
25a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar
25a4(nyi khri): cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i
25a5(nyi khri): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs
25a6(nyi khri): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
25a7(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i
25b1(nyi khri): mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol
25b2(nyi khri): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
25b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ngang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la
25b4(nyi khri): dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de
25b5(nyi khri): nas de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mo la/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog
25b6(nyi khri): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/
25b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog
26a1(nyi khri): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du
26a2(nyi khri): bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang
26a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/
26a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
26a5(nyi khri): pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas
26a6(nyi khri): kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /
26a7(nyi khri): spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang /
26b1(nyi khri): bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
26b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ /phyogs
26b3(nyi khri): gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad+mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
26b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog
26b5(nyi khri): bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang / dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
26b6(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de
26b7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
27a1(nyi khri): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas pad+mo de dag
27a2(nyi khri): gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab bar gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
27a3(nyi khri): nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
27a4(nyi khri): par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan
27a5(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas
27a6(nyi khri): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul
27a7(nyi khri): gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes
27b1(nyi khri): bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
27b2(nyi khri): de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na
27b3(nyi khri): chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba
27b4(nyi khri): der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'od chen po 'di
27b5(nyi khri): lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
27b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
27b7(nyi khri): chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
28a1(nyi khri): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
28a2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo / /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o/ /de nas
28a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
28a4(nyi khri): 'das/ bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta
28a5(nyi khri): ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag
28a6(nyi khri): par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

28b1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la/ pad+mo rin po che
28b2(nyi khri): sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
28b3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par
28b4(nyi khri): spyod dam zhes 'di ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal
28b5(nyi khri): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/
28b6(nyi khri): da ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyi/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang
28b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba
29a1(nyi khri): dam pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can la 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang

29a6(nyi khri): kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom
29a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i
29b1(nyi khri): dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can
