196b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
196b5(nyi khri): dang | phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
196b6(nyi khri): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
196b7(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs med
197a1(nyi khri): cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid
197a2(nyi khri): dang | phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
197a3(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
197a4(nyi khri): dang | rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
197a5(nyi khri): phyir| skye mched rnams dang / khams rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
197a6(nyi khri): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
197a7(nyi khri): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
197b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs
197b2(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
197b3(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
197b4(nyi khri): dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
197b5(nyi khri): gyi phyir/ de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med cing mi dmigs
197b6(nyi khri): so| |nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
197b7(nyi khri): bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa
198a1(nyi khri): nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /phyi nang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med
198a2(nyi khri): cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
198a3(nyi khri): bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe sems zhum pa
198a4(nyi khri): med cing yongs su zhum pa med la/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o//
198a5(nyi khri): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
198a6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag
198a7(nyi khri): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rnam par
198b1(nyi khri): shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
198b2(nyi khri): so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin
198b3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyen pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
198b4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
198b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
198b6(nyi khri): dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
198b7(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
199a1(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
199a2(nyi khri): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ rgyun du
199a3(nyi khri): zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
199a4(nyi khri): bar ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid
199a5(nyi khri): dang | chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub
199a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de'i phyir byang chub sems
199a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du
199b1(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang
199b2(nyi khri): bzhin ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i
199b3(nyi khri): rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med
199b4(nyi khri): pa'o| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar gzugs la gzugs kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la
199b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin med pa dang / skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / khams rnams la khams kyi rang bzhin med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la
199b6(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin med par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
199b7(nyi khri): gzugs la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /skye mched rnams la skye mched kyi
200a1(nyi khri): mtshan nyid med do/ /khams rnams la khams kyi mtshan nyid med do/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid med do/ /yang
200a2(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid med do/ /mtshan nyid la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/ /mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin la'ang mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin med do/ /
200a3(nyi khri): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor
200a4(nyi khri): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
200a5(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes/ ma byung ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na chos
200a6(nyi khri): thams cad ma skyes/ ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste/ de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs
200a7(nyi khri): so| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye pa'ang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i
200b1(nyi khri): bar du yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba'ang mi dmigs/ 'byung ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
200b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur ba de lta de ltar/ lus yongs su dag
200b3(nyi khri): pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang /
200b4(nyi khri): sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /zhe
200b5(nyi khri): sdang dang ldan pa dang / gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan
200b6(nyi khri): pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba dang ldan
200b7(nyi khri): pa'i sems mi skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ khor zug rtag par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang
201a1(nyi khri): ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
201a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
201a3(nyi khri): dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan dang legs pa 'di dag thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol
201a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brtson 'grus mi gtong bar spyad par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar
201a5(nyi khri): spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u lnga pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan
201a6(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
201a7(nyi khri): tshe| thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
201b1(nyi khri): dang | rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
201b2(nyi khri): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi
201b3(nyi khri): rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bde zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bde zhes
201b4(nyi khri): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes bsdug bsngal
201b5(nyi khri): zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag ces
201b6(nyi khri): bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med
201b7(nyi khri): ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bgyi bar
202a1(nyi khri): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
202a2(nyi khri): pa ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
202a3(nyi khri): pa dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /gal te gzugs mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
202a4(nyi khri): shes pa mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
202a5(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
202a6(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
202a7(nyi khri): dang | rnam par thar ba rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
202b1(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
202b2(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / mi dben pa zhes bgyi
202b3(nyi khri): par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b4(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bgyi bar spyod na/ dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma
202b5(nyi khri): la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
202b6(nyi khri): pa bsgom mo zhes bgyi bar spyod na'ang mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
202b7(nyi khri): bus| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas pa ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab
203a1(nyi khri): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
203a2(nyi khri): la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de gzugs la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang /
203a3(nyi khri): 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar
203a4(nyi khri): brjod do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob pas/
203a5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
203a6(nyi khri): 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
203a7(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ gzugs la mos shing 'du
203b1(nyi khri): shes te byin gyis rlob/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i rnam
203b2(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi
203b3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus
203b4(nyi khri): te reg pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i
203b5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mos
203b6(nyi khri): shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ ma rig pa la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor
203b7(nyi khri): ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
204a1(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
204a2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
204a3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / mig lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
204a4(nyi khri): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis rlob na/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos shing 'du shes te byin gyis brlabs
204a5(nyi khri): pas| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par 'du bya ba la spyod de/ de ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
204a6(nyi khri): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su mi 'grol/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems
204a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya
204b1(nyi khri): ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ thabs mi mkhas par shes
204b2(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis
204b3(nyi khri): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
204b4(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces
204b5(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang /
204b6(nyi khri): gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma
204b7(nyi khri): med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa dang / tshor ba dang /
205a1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
205a2(nyi khri): ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces
205a3(nyi khri): bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
205a4(nyi khri): thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang
205a5(nyi khri): gzugs med/ gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
205a6(nyi khri): shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong
205a7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong
205b1(nyi khri): pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
205b2(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
205b3(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
205b4(nyi khri): dang | byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las
205b5(nyi khri): gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
205b6(nyi khri): kyang stong pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ thabs mkhas par shes par
205b7(nyi khri): bya'o|| ||shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
206a1(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar skal pa yod do/ /de ni
206a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar mi dmigs so/ /
206a3(nyi khri): spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar mi dmigs so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
206a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar yang mi dmigs/ spyod
206a5(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
206a6(nyi khri): rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
206a7(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs
206b1(nyi khri): so| |spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi spyod pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos
206b2(nyi khri): thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gal te sems ma
206b3(nyi khri): zhum| kun tu ma zhum/ mi skrag/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
206b4(nyi khri): nyid dang nye bar gyur par rig par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med gnyis su byar med do/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa'
206b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ste/ rgya che ba mchog tu bya ba tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs
206b6(nyi khri): pa ste| ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /smras
206b7(nyi khri): pa| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin 'di 'ba' zhig gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
207a1(nyi khri): tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'am/ 'on te de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag kyang yod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan
207a2(nyi khri): dag la rnam par spyod pas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
207a3(nyi khri): yod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan gang dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
207a4(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin
207a5(nyi khri): dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
207a6(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /seng+ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i
207a7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad
207b1(nyi khri): kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan
207b2(nyi khri): dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab
207b3(nyi khri): tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag par 'phags
207b4(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshig bla dwags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod
207b5(nyi khri): do| |phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad
207b6(nyi khri): yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge
207b7(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
208a1(nyi khri): seng+ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
208a2(nyi khri): rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
208a3(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do/ /dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba
208a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
208a5(nyi khri): glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
208a6(nyi khri): yod do/ /zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya
208a7(nyi khri): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
208b1(nyi khri): snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ye shes dpa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems
208b2(nyi khri): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
208b3(nyi khri): chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi 'phags
208b4(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge mnyam par 'gong pa
208b5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
208b6(nyi khri): rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab ri ba med pa zhes bya ba'i
208b7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yul las brdal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yon tan
209a1(nyi khri): thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing
209a2(nyi khri): gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi mnyam pa dang
209a3(nyi khri): mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nem nur rnam par sel
209a4(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes
209a5(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /srid pa'i gzhi thams cad
209a6(nyi khri): rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
209a7(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do/ /sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
209b1(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /
209b2(nyi khri): zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ /gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
209b3(nyi khri): 'dzin yod do/ /'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma
209b4(nyi khri): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting
209b5(nyi khri): nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
209b6(nyi khri): rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa dang
209b7(nyi khri): bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /de bzhin nyid
210a1(nyi khri): la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel bas rab tu 'dul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ngag gi
210a2(nyi khri): skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes
210a3(nyi khri): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
210a4(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang
210a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi
210a6(nyi khri): sgo gang la bslabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
210a7(nyi khri): de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
210b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
210b2(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
210b3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
210b4(nyi khri): lung bstan to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom
210b5(nyi khri): sems su 'gyur ba'ang med do/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o/ /bdag ni mnyam par bzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/
210b6(nyi khri): de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi rgyu'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de
210b7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni med do/ /de
211a1(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
211a2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang
211a3(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya
211a4(nyi khri): ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus
211a5(nyi khri): sam| rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab
211a6(nyi khri): 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ rtog pa med pa'i
211a7(nyi khri): phyir ro/ /smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do/ /
211b1(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do/ /'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa
211b2(nyi khri): med cing / 'du shes su 'gyur ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de'ang med la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang med pa'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med
211b3(nyi khri): do| |'du shes su 'gyur ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor/ legs so/ /legs so/ /tshig 'di ni legs
211b4(nyi khri): par bshad do/ /ji ltar ngas nyon mongs pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
211b5(nyi khri): pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
211b6(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslab par
211b7(nyi khri): bya'o| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes
212a1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
212a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
212a3(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob po/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
212a4(nyi khri): slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
212a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs
212a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom
212a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang
212b1(nyi khri): zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shed pa po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams
212b2(nyi khri): dang | rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi
212b3(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs
212b4(nyi khri): med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
212b5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar
212b6(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
212b7(nyi khri): rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
213a1(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan gcig
213a2(nyi khri): phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
213a3(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir byang chub mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
213a4(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs
213a5(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i
213a6(nyi khri): tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
213a7(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang slob pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
213b1(nyi khri): chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis
213b2(nyi khri): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir med ces bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ci'i slad du
213b3(nyi khri): mchis pa ma lags pa de la mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
213b4(nyi khri): bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma
213b5(nyi khri): yin no| |byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
213b6(nyi khri): brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ sred pa
213b7(nyi khri): la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing / 'di lta ste/ chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/ de dag mi shes
214a1(nyi khri): mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par
214a2(nyi khri): zhen cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to/ /de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi
214a3(nyi khri): shes mi mthong ngo / /ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo / /skye mched
214a4(nyi khri): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
214a5(nyi khri): kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo / /de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dong ba ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas
214a6(nyi khri): 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis nas 'byung ba ma yin
214a7(nyi khri): no| |de dag ni yid mi ches pa ste/ ji ltar yid mi ches zhe na/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so/ /byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid
214b1(nyi khri): mi ches so/ /de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
214b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma
214b3(nyi khri): yin| sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/
214b4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched dang /
214b5(nyi khri): khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon
214b6(nyi khri): par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar slong pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
214b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de
215a1(nyi khri): ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung
215a2(nyi khri): ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung
215a3(nyi khri): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
215a4(nyi khri): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
215a5(nyi khri): pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu
215a6(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon
215a7(nyi khri): par zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa
215b1(nyi khri): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin
215b2(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
215b3(nyi khri): bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
215b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags
215b5(nyi khri): na| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba
215b6(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
215b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/ rnam pa
216a1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin no/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
216a2(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
216a3(nyi khri): mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub
216a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
216a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
216a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/
216a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo po nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
216b1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u drug pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
216b2(nyi khri): gyis| bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa
216b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
216b4(nyi khri): bgyi| ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
216b5(nyi khri): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs
216b6(nyi khri): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
216b7(nyi khri): pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das/ de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom
217a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dri'i/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor/ de ji
217a2(nyi khri): snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang
217a3(nyi khri): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan
217a4(nyi khri): la| sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gzugs kyang gzhan
217a5(nyi khri): la| sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi rnam par
217a6(nyi khri): shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam
217a7(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig
217b1(nyi khri): yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu
217b2(nyi khri): ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
217b3(nyi khri): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
217b4(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
217b5(nyi khri): de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /
217b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin
217b7(nyi khri): snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/ sgyu
218a1(nyi khri): ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/
218a2(nyi khri): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang
218a3(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig kyang gzhan ma lags/
218a4(nyi khri): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/ bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
218a5(nyi khri): ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs
218a6(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ chos
218a7(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa
218b1(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus
218b2(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam
218b3(nyi khri): par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
218b4(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
218b5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
218b6(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi
218b7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
219a1(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma
219a2(nyi khri): lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
219a3(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /
219a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
219a5(nyi khri): ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/
219a6(nyi khri): sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
219a7(nyi khri): 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/
219b1(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas
219b2(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
219b3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos
219b4(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad
219b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
219b6(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phyung po lnga po 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
219b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
220a1(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga
220a2(nyi khri): po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol
220a3(nyi khri): pa| bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags
220a4(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med
220a5(nyi khri): pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang | kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi
220a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du
220a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
220b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi par dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
220b2(nyi khri): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
220b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
220b4(nyi khri): du 'byung ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems
220b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
220b6(nyi khri): 'das/ de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ phung
220b7(nyi khri): po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni
221a1(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma
221a2(nyi khri): mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag
221a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i
221a4(nyi khri): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /
221a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / smig
221a6(nyi khri): rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
221a7(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgra brnyan ni
221b1(nyi khri): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/
221b2(nyi khri): sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ni
221b3(nyi khri): 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes
221b4(nyi khri): pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go / de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta
221b5(nyi khri): bu ste| rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
221b6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni mig yor lta bu'o/ /tshor ba
221b7(nyi khri): dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs
222a1(nyi khri): ni chu zla lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po
222a2(nyi khri): drug go / de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes
222a3(nyi khri): pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go / de ni phung po lnga'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
222a4(nyi khri): ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
222a5(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar
222a6(nyi khri): du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing dngangs pa dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gal
222a7(nyi khri): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'ang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i
222b1(nyi khri): bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang mi 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing dngangs pa dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
222b2(nyi khri): bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
222b3(nyi khri): 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs
222b4(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
222b5(nyi khri): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
222b6(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so//
222b7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi
223a1(nyi khri): gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog
223a2(nyi khri): ste| de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
223a3(nyi khri): dang | rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs
223a4(nyi khri): so| |tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
223a5(nyi khri): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi
223a6(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
223a7(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med
223b1(nyi khri): ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
223b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes
223b3(nyi khri): bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/
223b4(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs
223b5(nyi khri): mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
223b6(nyi khri): shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par
223b7(nyi khri): byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
224a1(nyi khri): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
224a2(nyi khri): shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi
224a3(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
224a4(nyi khri): yid la bya bas gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de
224a5(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
224a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs smon pa med
224a7(nyi khri): pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa
224b1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
224b2(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben pa'i
224b3(nyi khri): rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
224b4(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
224b5(nyi khri): rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
224b6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
224b7(nyi khri): dang | smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
225a1(nyi khri): shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /
225a2(nyi khri): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa
225a3(nyi khri): med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
225a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
225a5(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi
225a6(nyi khri): rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal
225a7(nyi khri): ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
