225b1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma
225b2(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems
225b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur
225b4(nyi khri): ro| |rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam
225b5(nyi khri): ba dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i
225b6(nyi khri): rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang
225b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
226a1(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab
226a2(nyi khri): tu rtog go/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
226a3(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
226a4(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag
226a5(nyi khri): med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben
226a6(nyi khri): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi
226a7(nyi khri): 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi
226b1(nyi khri): dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
226b2(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i
226b3(nyi khri): chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
226b4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /
226b5(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
226b6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya
226b7(nyi khri): ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
227a1(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyis mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gsam gtan
227a2(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi
227a3(nyi khri): shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
227a4(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang /
227a5(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig
227a6(nyi khri): gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig go /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/
227a7(nyi khri): yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid do/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /sgra
227b1(nyi khri): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
227b2(nyi khri): kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i
227b3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid
227b4(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/
227b5(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
227b6(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid
227b7(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
228a1(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i
228a2(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
228a3(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
228a4(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid
228a5(nyi khri): kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid
228a6(nyi khri): kyang stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
228a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
228b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis
228b2(nyi khri): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes
228b3(nyi khri): gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang / de la gzugs mi rtag ces
228b4(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
228b5(nyi khri): su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
228b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
228b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ gzugs sdug
229a1(nyi khri): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya
229a2(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
229a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
229a4(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
229a5(nyi khri): pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar
229a6(nyi khri): da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
229a7(nyi khri): ston pa dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces
229b1(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
229b2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
229b3(nyi khri): ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
229b4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
229b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ mig mi
229b6(nyi khri): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
229b7(nyi khri): mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

230a7(nyi khri): bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
230b1(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dpen zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
230b2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi

230b6(nyi khri): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang /

232b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

233a2(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos

235a1(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi

235a3(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi
235a4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna
235a5(nyi khri): ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las
235a6(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
235a7(nyi khri): tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
235b1(nyi khri): ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de
235b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te
235b3(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
235b4(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba
235b5(nyi khri): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus
235b6(nyi khri): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
235b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
236a1(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
236a2(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
236a3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
236a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal
236a5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
236a6(nyi khri): bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
236a7(nyi khri): cing | dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas
236b1(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang /
236b2(nyi khri): stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
236b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i
236b4(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
236b5(nyi khri): par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par
236b6(nyi khri): bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par
236b7(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi
237a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs mi mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par ltung
237a2(nyi khri): zhing | dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
237a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/
237a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su
237a5(nyi khri): byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
237a6(nyi khri): zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des
237a7(nyi khri): rlom sems su byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems
237b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
237b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes
237b3(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
237b4(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
237b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/
237b6(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar
237b7(nyi khri): yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba
238a1(nyi khri): dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
238a2(nyi khri): yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid
238a3(nyi khri): de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed
238a4(nyi khri): do| |gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i
238a5(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
238a6(nyi khri): chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/
238a7(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems
238b1(nyi khri): su byed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes
238b2(nyi khri): bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /
238b3(nyi khri): lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
238b4(nyi khri): la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs
238b5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la
238b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi
238b7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i
239a1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus
239a2(nyi khri): te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
239a3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo
239a4(nyi khri): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
239a5(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus
239a6(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
239a7(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar
239b1(nyi khri): yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus
239b2(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs
239b3(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /sa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya
239b4(nyi khri): bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
239b5(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam
239b6(nyi khri): par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
239b7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid
240a1(nyi khri): la byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang /
240a2(nyi khri): skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya
240a3(nyi khri): bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
240a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag
240a5(nyi khri): gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
240a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye
240a7(nyi khri): bar bzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub
240b1(nyi khri): kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i
240b2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
240b3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
240b4(nyi khri): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de
240b5(nyi khri): dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas
240b6(nyi khri): pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
240b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngangs la skrag par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa'i grogs po'i
241a1(nyi khri): sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po
241a2(nyi khri): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
241a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas
241a4(nyi khri): gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ni bslab par bya ba'i mi cha'o/ /mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung
241a5(nyi khri): bar mi bya'o/ /bcang bar mi bya'o/ /bklag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub bar mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor/
241a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/
241a7(nyi khri): 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing / mos pa med
241b1(nyi khri): par byed de/ rigs kyi bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
241b2(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha
241b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di dag ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
241b5(nyi khri): chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di
241b6(nyi khri): ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par bstan pa dag ston to/ /'grel to/ /rnam par
241b7(nyi khri): 'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//
242a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di
242a2(nyi khri): skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems kyang cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
242a3(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so/ /zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
242a4(nyi khri): grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di
242a5(nyi khri): skad du/ rigs kyi bu/ mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag
242a6(nyi khri): gis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes
242a7(nyi khri): pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus
242b1(nyi khri): te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni
242b2(nyi khri): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
242b3(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis
242b4(nyi khri): stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
242b5(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis
242b6(nyi khri): stong ngo / /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang
242b7(nyi khri): ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
243a1(nyi khri): yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu/
243a2(nyi khri): shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /byang chub sems
243a3(nyi khri): dpa' zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
243a4(nyi khri): bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
243a5(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'ang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba'ang med do zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
243a6(nyi khri): grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa
243a7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las ldog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'doms pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi
243b1(nyi khri): las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag /mkhan po
243b2(nyi khri): dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las ldog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
243b3(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las ldog ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
243b4(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i bar
243b5(nyi khri): gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyi sa mngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
243b6(nyi khri): chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /
243b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pha dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par
244a1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkang lag
244a2(nyi khri): dang mgo bcad pa chad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod
244a3(nyi khri): pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig /ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las
244a4(nyi khri): dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi
244a5(nyi khri): cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba
244a6(nyi khri): dang | bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
244a7(nyi khri): ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang /
244b1(nyi khri): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang /
244b2(nyi khri): mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben
244b3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
244b4(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
244b5(nyi khri): gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs
244b6(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
244b7(nyi khri): dang | smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug
245a1(nyi khri): bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes
245a2(nyi khri): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi
245a3(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
245a4(nyi khri): med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
245a5(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa

245a7(nyi khri): dang | zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mig
245b1(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
245b2(nyi khri): 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus
245b3(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
245b4(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag
245b5(nyi khri): pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med
245b6(nyi khri): pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang /
245b7(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi
246a1(nyi khri): rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
246a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po dag rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u bdun pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang
246a3(nyi khri): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig
246a4(nyi khri): gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ byang chub la'ang tshig med/ sems can la'ang tshig med pas/
246a5(nyi khri): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don med pa'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
246a6(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/

246b2(nyi khri): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu zla dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
246b3(nyi khri): sprul pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin
246b4(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /
246b5(nyi khri): chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab

246b7(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
247a1(nyi khri): bu'i mig la gnas med do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems

247a7(nyi khri): reg pa la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas
247b1(nyi khri): med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di
247b2(nyi khri): lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor

247b6(nyi khri): pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig

248a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don
248a2(nyi khri): med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// //
248a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
248a4(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
248a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i
248a6(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
248a7(nyi khri): dang | 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
248b1(nyi khri): rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de
248b2(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
248b3(nyi khri): 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
248b4(nyi khri): na| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
248b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
248b6(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa
248b7(nyi khri): de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
249a1(nyi khri): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig
249a2(nyi khri): de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab
249a3(nyi khri): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir
249a4(nyi khri): zhe na/ yid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
249a5(nyi khri): med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs
249a6(nyi khri): de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /
249a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do/ /de ci'i
249b1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
249b2(nyi khri): do| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
249b3(nyi khri): mig gi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
249b4(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes
249b5(nyi khri): pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab
249b6(nyi khri): 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper
249b7(nyi khri): na| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir
250a1(nyi khri): te| rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
250a2(nyi khri): med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /

250a4(nyi khri): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin
250a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
250a6(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
250a7(nyi khri): don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
250b1(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
250b2(nyi khri): la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
250b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
250b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

250b6(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas
250b7(nyi khri): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
251a1(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
251a2(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
251a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
251a4(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
251a5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
251a6(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
251a7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
251b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
251b2(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de med pa'i
251b3(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/
251b4(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
251b5(nyi khri): dang | bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms

252a1(nyi khri): zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
252a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med do/ /'dus
252a3(nyi khri): byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
252a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
252a5(nyi khri): par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
252a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/
252a7(nyi khri): 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / gang
252b1(nyi khri): gi mi dmigs pa la gnas ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs
252b2(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa la

252b5(nyi khri): par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
252b6(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la
252b7(nyi khri): gnas med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
253a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /

253b3(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i

253b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag
254a1(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed
254a2(nyi khri): can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang
254a3(nyi khri): zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/

254a5(nyi khri): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
254a6(nyi khri): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med do/ /rab
254a7(nyi khri): 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/

254b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
254b3(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
254b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
254b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
254b6(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par
254b7(nyi khri): ma grol ba'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
255a1(nyi khri): do| |rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
255a2(nyi khri): gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
255a3(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems
255a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gza' dang / skar ma dang /
255a5(nyi khri): nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
255a6(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / mtshe
255a7(nyi khri): ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og
255b1(nyi khri): min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
255b2(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
255b3(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
255b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
255b5(nyi khri): gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan
255b6(nyi khri): nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
255b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med par yang rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad
256a1(nyi khri): ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang rnams kyi ma chags pa dang / mchis pa ma lags pa
256a2(nyi khri): yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni gang rnams rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
256a3(nyi khri): chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa
256a4(nyi khri): dang | 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni chos
256a5(nyi khri): thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos de dag thams cad la ma chags pa dang / med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'
256a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos shes par bya ba'ang chos thams cad dngos po de dag nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan
256a7(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni/ phar shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa
256b1(nyi khri): la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang /
256b2(nyi khri): nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bu can gyi
256b3(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i
256b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
256b5(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa
256b6(nyi khri): dang | tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su
256b7(nyi khri): dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan
257a1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /ma byin par
257a2(nyi khri): len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang / tshig kyal pa dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta
257a3(nyi khri): ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor/ de dag
257a4(nyi khri): ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ lung du ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus kyi las ni lung ma
257a5(nyi khri): bstan pa'o/ /ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /yid kyi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /skye mched
257a6(nyi khri): drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /gzugs med pa bzhir skyes pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /rnam par smin pa thams cad
257a7(nyi khri): ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni lung ma bstan pa'i chos su shes par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan/
257b1(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang /
257b2(nyi khri): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par de ma yin par 'jig rten
257b3(nyi khri): pa'i chos gnag ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
257b4(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po
257b5(nyi khri): lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
257b6(nyi khri): pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang
257b7(nyi khri): bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa
258a1(nyi khri): dang | shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di
258a2(nyi khri): ni| rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni
258a3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam
258a4(nyi khri): mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha'
258a5(nyi khri): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa lnga
258a6(nyi khri): pa'o| |de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
258a7(nyi khri): ni| rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
258b1(nyi khri): gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar
258b2(nyi khri): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po da dag dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
258b3(nyi khri): de 'dod pas bden/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye
258b4(nyi khri): bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de rnams par rtog pa dang / rna par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par
258b5(nyi khri): dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas
258b6(nyi khri): dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde pa la rnam par spyod pa/ btang
258b7(nyi khri): snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang /
259a1(nyi khri): yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa
259a2(nyi khri): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du
259a3(nyi khri): shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas
259a4(nyi khri): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam
259a5(nyi khri): shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung
259a6(nyi khri): zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du
259a7(nyi khri): shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
259b1(nyi khri): dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
259b2(nyi khri): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /
259b3(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/
259b4(nyi khri): phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/
259b5(nyi khri): de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
259b6(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'i chos ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
259b7(nyi khri): bdun pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
260a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
260a2(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag
260a3(nyi khri): ste| de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus byas
260a4(nyi khri): kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/ byang
260a5(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
260a6(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni/ gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas
260a7(nyi khri): pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos
260b1(nyi khri): nyid chos kyi dbyings nyid/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
260b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
260b3(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
260b4(nyi khri): 'das/ thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
260b5(nyi khri): cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
260b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba la spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o/ /chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa
260b7(nyi khri): med cing / rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
261a1(nyi khri): 'das/ gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom
261a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chan po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /
261a3(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems can
261a4(nyi khri): gyi phung po chen po nges pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa
261a5(nyi khri): dang | rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
261a6(nyi khri): phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor/ de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems
261a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po
261b1(nyi khri): nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
261b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o/ /bdag gis ba dog pa thams cad yongs su
261b3(nyi khri): gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
