261b4(nyi khri): bar bya'o/ /de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
261b5(nyi khri): pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa
261b6(nyi khri): thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis phung po nas brtsams te/ pha
261b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /
262a1(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar bsgrub pa khong du chud pa la bslab par
262a2(nyi khri): bya'o| |bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
262a3(nyi khri): sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
262a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
262a5(nyi khri): r ten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su
262a6(nyi khri): myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du'ang
262a7(nyi khri): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can gang yang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal
262b1(nyi khri): ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
262b2(nyi khri): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de nas gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i
262b3(nyi khri): rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o
262b4(nyi khri): snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
262b5(nyi khri): chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun mi 'chad par rlabs po
262b6(nyi khri): che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni
262b7(nyi khri): sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed/ gti mug gi sems mi bskyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi bskyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang
263a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi bskyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed
263a2(nyi khri): kyang | sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi bsgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang
263a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bsgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
263a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bsgul ba'o/ /sems des sems can thams cad kyi phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
263a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde
263a6(nyi khri): ba'i sems ni/ sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems
263a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor/
263b1(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor
263b2(nyi khri): la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod
263b3(nyi khri): pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan
263b4(nyi khri): du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor
263b5(nyi khri): la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs
263b6(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/
263b7(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang
264a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden
264a2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
264a3(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
264a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
264a5(nyi khri): bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
264a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i
264a7(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ chos de dag la gnas shing / byang chub
264b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
264b2(nyi khri): po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
264b3(nyi khri): zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de la spobs pa skyed cig /shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag
264b4(nyi khri): tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes
264b5(nyi khri): pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba
264b6(nyi khri): dang | rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs
264b7(nyi khri): su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba dang /
265a1(nyi khri): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa bgyid kyang / de
265a2(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la
265a3(nyi khri): 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
265a4(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
265a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshor ba
265a6(nyi khri): dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar
265a7(nyi khri): dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba
265b1(nyi khri): rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
265b2(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /rnam
265b3(nyi khri): par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
265b4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
265b5(nyi khri): 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
265b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur
265b7(nyi khri): ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thab
266a1(nyi khri): mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la
266a2(nyi khri): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
266a3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan
266a4(nyi khri): thos dang | rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
266a5(nyi khri): zhes bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni/ zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams
266a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la'ang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis
266a7(nyi khri): pas| de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems ma mchis pa
266b1(nyi khri): de la'ang chags pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
266b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe
266b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gag pa dang /
266b4(nyi khri): 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang
266b5(nyi khri): la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la
266b6(nyi khri): nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sems med do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
266b7(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems
267a1(nyi khri): so| |smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud pa med pa/ de lta
267a2(nyi khri): bu'i sems la'ang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de bas gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
267a3(nyi khri): dang | rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de bzhin te/
267a4(nyi khri): gzugs kyang chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par
267a5(nyi khri): 'byung ba'ang chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams
267a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de'ang zag pa med cing / khongs su
267a7(nyi khri): chud pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med
267b1(nyi khri): cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing
267b2(nyi khri): khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med
267b3(nyi khri): cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom
267b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa
267b5(nyi khri): nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /
267b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa
267b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
268a1(nyi khri): zag pa med cing khongs su chud ba med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med
268a2(nyi khri): cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
268a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems
268a4(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ sems de la'ang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ der yang ma zad de/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med
268a5(nyi khri): do| |tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar
268a6(nyi khri): du med pa'ang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la
268a7(nyi khri): chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'ang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de de
268b1(nyi khri): bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'ang / rnam par shes pa la
268b2(nyi khri): chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa'ang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du
268b3(nyi khri): med pa'ang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'ang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med
268b4(nyi khri): do| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
268b5(nyi khri): sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon
268b6(nyi khri): par chags par 'gyur ba med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
268b7(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
269a1(nyi khri): gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
269a2(nyi khri): de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems
269a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na
269a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
269a5(nyi khri): chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin
269a6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims bsrung ba ma
269a7(nyi khri): yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
269b1(nyi khri): la gnas shing / bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa bsgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson
269b2(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus brtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus brtsom
269b3(nyi khri): mo| |sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ bsam gtan gyi pha
269b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan bskyed do/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can
269b5(nyi khri): thams cad kyi don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab bsgom mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus
269b6(nyi khri): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed
269b7(nyi khri): cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
270a1(nyi khri): chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
270a2(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
270a3(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi
270a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
270a5(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar
270a6(nyi khri): bya'o| |bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
270a7(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
270b1(nyi khri): dang | sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed de/ tshe
270b2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
270b3(nyi khri): pa| bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong
270b4(nyi khri): pa de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems
270b5(nyi khri): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
270b6(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin ba yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams
270b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
271a1(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
271a2(nyi khri): bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten
271a3(nyi khri): pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang
271a4(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
271a5(nyi khri): brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus
271a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa
271a7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems
271b1(nyi khri): bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
271b2(nyi khri): phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/
271b3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/ len
271b4(nyi khri): pa'ang mi dmigs par dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo
271b5(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan
271b6(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang
271b7(nyi khri): chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha
272a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
272a2(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag thams cad sems can
272a3(nyi khri): thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
272a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
272a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la'ang mos
272a6(nyi khri): pa mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol
272a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul
272b1(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
272b2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
272b3(nyi khri): pa'i yin la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha
272b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad
272b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
272b6(nyi khri): de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
272b7(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan
273a1(nyi khri): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi
273a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /
273a3(nyi khri): tshul khrims de'ang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
273a4(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang
273a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug bo thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen
273a6(nyi khri): po bgos zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang
273a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can
273b1(nyi khri): thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
273b2(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
273b3(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge
273b4(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
273b5(nyi khri): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod
273b6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
273b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan
274a1(nyi khri): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu
274a2(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
274a3(nyi khri): phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
274a4(nyi khri): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
274a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
274a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
274a7(nyi khri): pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing bzod pa la mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
274b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
274b2(nyi khri): po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang / sems can ngang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang
274b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
274b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
274b5(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
274b6(nyi khri): tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
274b7(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
275a1(nyi khri): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang
275a2(nyi khri): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
275a3(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
275a4(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod
275a5(nyi khri): pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
275a6(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
275a7(nyi khri): yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
275b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
275b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di
275b3(nyi khri): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang
275b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
275b5(nyi khri): chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de'ang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams
275b6(nyi khri): cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
275b7(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
276a1(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
276a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
276a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
276a4(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
276a5(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
276a6(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
276a7(nyi khri): gyi| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na
276b1(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
276b2(nyi khri): pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
276b3(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang
276b4(nyi khri): thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
276b5(nyi khri): pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
276b6(nyi khri): la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i
276b7(nyi khri): rtsa ba de'ang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
277a1(nyi khri): chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
277a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la
277a3(nyi khri): dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
277a4(nyi khri): te| bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam
277a5(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
277a6(nyi khri): chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / bsam gtan de'ang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang
277a7(nyi khri): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
277b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams
277b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
277b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
277b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum
277b5(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di
277b6(nyi khri): ni| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub
277b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
278a1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
278a2(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go
278a3(nyi khri): cha'o| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
278a4(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la gnas shing brten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang
278a5(nyi khri): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
278a6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos
278a7(nyi khri): dang | rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / dge ba'i
278b1(nyi khri): rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
278b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
278b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu
278b4(nyi khri): byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
278b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
278b6(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin
278b7(nyi khri): gyi| rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong
279a1(nyi khri): du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
279a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
279a3(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
279a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
279a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
279a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
279a7(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro'ang myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad
279b1(nyi khri): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
279b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
279b3(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang
279b4(nyi khri): dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
279b5(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
279b6(nyi khri): pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang /
279b7(nyi khri): shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams
280a1(nyi khri): kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
280a2(nyi khri): go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad de/
280a3(nyi khri): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs zhes bya/ byang chub sems
280a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin
280a5(nyi khri): pa drug la spyod de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa
280a6(nyi khri): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
280a7(nyi khri): so| |de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu
280b1(nyi khri): bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan
280b2(nyi khri): pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs
280b3(nyi khri): su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do//
280b4(nyi khri): de tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe'ang / rnam pa thams
280b5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
280b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang
280b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
281a1(nyi khri): byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs
281a2(nyi khri): pa| shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /
281a3(nyi khri): snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa
281a4(nyi khri): med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
281a5(nyi khri): ste| mos par byas shing / rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i
281a6(nyi khri): dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
281a7(nyi khri): so| |nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
281b1(nyi khri): te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
281b2(nyi khri): snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing / 'chad
281b3(nyi khri): pa dang / ston cing 'grel la/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
281b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis/ bsam gtan
281b5(nyi khri): dang | tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/
281b6(nyi khri): sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
281b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod
282a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to snyam du sems shing / yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang /
282a2(nyi khri): mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'
282a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis
282a4(nyi khri): rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
282a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan
282a6(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi
282a7(nyi khri): ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
282b1(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i
282b2(nyi khri): rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa rab tu
282b3(nyi khri): rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
282b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa
282b5(nyi khri): chen po'o/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
282b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
282b7(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
283a1(nyi khri): pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
283a2(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
283a3(nyi khri): cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
283a4(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab
283a5(nyi khri): par bya'o zhes/ de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting
283a6(nyi khri): nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog
283a7(nyi khri): cing | sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol par byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
283b1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang /
283b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
283b3(nyi khri): pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med
283b4(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
283b5(nyi khri): du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
283b6(nyi khri): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus
283b7(nyi khri): mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa'
284a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan
284a2(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa'ang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/
284a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
284a4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang la/ de dag la
284a5(nyi khri): mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam
284a6(nyi khri): par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes
284a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan
284b1(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
284b2(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
284b3(nyi khri): po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par
284b4(nyi khri): bzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
284b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bas shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang / bdag med pa dang / sdug pa dang /
284b6(nyi khri): mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang
284b7(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gang 'das pa'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ye shes
285a1(nyi khri): mi 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la ye shes mi 'jug pa ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dus gsum la ye shes mi 'jug pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan
285a2(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
285a3(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs
285a4(nyi khri): dang | gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa'ang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
285a5(nyi khri): pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la'ang
285a6(nyi khri): shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la'ang shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
285a7(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa'ang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang
285b1(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub
285b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
285b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub
285b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ len pa'ang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
285b5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
285b6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi
285b7(nyi khri): dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / shes
286a1(nyi khri): rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/
286a2(nyi khri): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
286a3(nyi khri): bu| gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/
286a4(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/
286a5(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi
286a6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi
286a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
286b1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
286b2(nyi khri): bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden
286b3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
286b4(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
286b5(nyi khri): pas| bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa
286b6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
286b7(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
287a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
287a2(nyi khri): pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs
287a3(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa
287a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /mig mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mig ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi
287a5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
287a6(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi
287a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs
287b1(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /
287b2(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming
287b3(nyi khri): tsam du zad do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi
287b4(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang /
287b5(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
287b6(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs
287b7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni
288a1(nyi khri): ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
288a2(nyi khri): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
288a3(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i
288a4(nyi khri): phyir| sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
288a5(nyi khri): theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying
288a6(nyi khri): po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
288a7(nyi khri): la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir/ tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang
288b1(nyi khri): du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang / 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di
288b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can
288b3(nyi khri): rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis
288b4(nyi khri): su med pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad
288b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du theg pa de dang nam du'ang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
288b6(nyi khri): thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i
288b7(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs
289a1(nyi khri): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi
289a2(nyi khri): khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams
289a3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho dang /
289a4(nyi khri): nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
289a5(nyi khri): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
289a6(nyi khri): chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
289a7(nyi khri): nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing / dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
289b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ go cha chen
289b2(nyi khri): po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad
289b3(nyi khri): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
289b4(nyi khri): chen po'i go cha chen po gyon cing / 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
289b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang
289b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
289b7(nyi khri): dang | dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
290a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
290a2(nyi khri): dang | mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas
290a3(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
290a4(nyi khri): gyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi phye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang
290a5(nyi khri): phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
290a6(nyi khri): bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
290a7(nyi khri): snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs
290b1(nyi khri): kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i
290b2(nyi khri): me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod
290b3(nyi khri): do| |dbyangs sgrog go / de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems
