290b4(nyi khri): can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
290b5(nyi khri): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo //
290b6(nyi khri): de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho
290b7(nyi khri): skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye
291a1(nyi khri): bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon
291a2(nyi khri): par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos
291a3(nyi khri): kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du
291a4(nyi khri): sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag
291a5(nyi khri): nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
291a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bsgral yang / sems can gang yang
291a7(nyi khri): yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na
291b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i
291b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba/ mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar bai DUR+Ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par
291b3(nyi khri): sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /skom
291b4(nyi khri): 'dod pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa
291b5(nyi khri): rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la
291b6(nyi khri): yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang /
291b7(nyi khri): dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i
292a1(nyi khri): bar du sbyin par byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol
292a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma
292a3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig
292a4(nyi khri): gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang
292a5(nyi khri): rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/
292a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
292a7(nyi khri): rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang yang ci'ang byin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
292b1(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ go cha chen po bgos
292b2(nyi khri): pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / ched du bsams te/ skye ba yongs su bzung bas/ 'khor
292b3(nyi khri): los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing / de 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad
292b4(nyi khri): med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
292b5(nyi khri): pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
292b6(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god
292b7(nyi khri): de| sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab
293a1(nyi khri): 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i
293a2(nyi khri): tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
293a3(nyi khri): la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa
293a4(nyi khri): yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
293a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
293a6(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis
293a7(nyi khri): de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
293b1(nyi khri): stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bco lnga pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod
293b2(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams
293b3(nyi khri): cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
293b4(nyi khri): brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas brdeg cing / mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o/ /zhes go
293b5(nyi khri): cha gyon cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas
293b6(nyi khri): pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba dang / rab
293b7(nyi khri): tu dgod par byas na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

294a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med/ grangs med pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do//
294a3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
294a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems
294a5(nyi khri): can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go / 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus

294a7(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang / sems kyi brtson
294b1(nyi khri): 'grus la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go / 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i
294b2(nyi khri): bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du

294b4(nyi khri): de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ lus dang sems
294b5(nyi khri): kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang / sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos
294b6(nyi khri): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems
294b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /
295a1(nyi khri): 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam
295a2(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos
295a3(nyi khri): nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la'ang 'khrug pa'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de bzhin du
295a4(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang / 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang / nam
295a5(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
295a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun
295a7(nyi khri): du| skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
295b1(nyi khri): mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
295b2(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can
295b3(nyi khri): gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i
295b4(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
295b5(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /'god do/ /rab 'byor/ ji
295b6(nyi khri): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang /
295b7(nyi khri): gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/
296a1(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
296a2(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go /
296a3(nyi khri): 'god do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs
296a4(nyi khri): kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te/ bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du
296a5(nyi khri): sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
296a6(nyi khri): de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol
296a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos
296b1(nyi khri): rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
296b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
296b3(nyi khri): gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ 'god
296b4(nyi khri): do| |ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
296b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
296b6(nyi khri): dag par bskul zhing gzhog go / 'god do/ /'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par
296b7(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang /
297a1(nyi khri): lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar
297a2(nyi khri): bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa
297a3(nyi khri): de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ 'god do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
297a4(nyi khri): dang | brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ 'god do/ /'di lta
297a5(nyi khri): ste| pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas
297a6(nyi khri): kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa
297a7(nyi khri): zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par
297b1(nyi khri): bskul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor/ de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa
297b2(nyi khri): drug la yang dag par bskul zhing bzhag ste/ bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin
297b3(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang /
297b4(nyi khri): lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu
297b5(nyi khri): phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos
297b6(nyi khri): nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
297b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing / sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed de/ bdag
298a1(nyi khri): gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed
298a2(nyi khri): cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
298a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /'di
298a4(nyi khri): snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//
298a5(nyi khri): bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan
298a6(nyi khri): gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed
298a7(nyi khri): cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /'di
298b1(nyi khri): snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can tshad med/ grangs med pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod
298b2(nyi khri): par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can tshad med/ grangs med pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
298b3(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
298b4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang /
298b5(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
298b6(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
298b7(nyi khri): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o/ /
299a1(nyi khri): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o/ /rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam pa
299a2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa
299a3(nyi khri): zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med/
299a4(nyi khri): grangs med pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor/
299a5(nyi khri): de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des/ sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ rnam pa thams
299a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du byang
299a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med/ grangs med pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par sems bskyed kyang
299b1(nyi khri): sems can gang gi don du'ang sems bskyed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab
299b2(nyi khri): 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis
299b3(nyi khri): gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i
299b4(nyi khri): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /mig
299b5(nyi khri): mig gis stong ngo / /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo / /gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo / /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos
299b6(nyi khri): kyis stong ngo / /mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam
299b7(nyi khri): par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /mig gis 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i
300a1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / /mig gi 'dus te
300a2(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo / /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i
300a3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas
300a4(nyi khri): stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
300a5(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po
300a6(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
300a7(nyi khri): gyis stong ngo / /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
300b1(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo
300b2(nyi khri): dang | de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
300b3(nyi khri): rnams kyis stong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo / /go cha chen po'ang go cha chen pos stong ste| bcom ldan 'das/ rnam grangs des na/
300b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin
300b5(nyi khri): te| de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
300b6(nyi khri): chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams
300b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha bgos pa'i sems can
301a1(nyi khri): de dag kyang ci'i slad du ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ byed pa po
301a2(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don
301a3(nyi khri): du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi
301a4(nyi khri): byed| mngon par mi byed do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/ mig mi byed/ rnam par
301a5(nyi khri): mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/ gzugs mi byed/ rnam
301a6(nyi khri): par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi
301a7(nyi khri): byed| rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid
301b1(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
301b2(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/ mig gi
301b3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /

301b5(nyi khri): do| |rab 'byor/ bdag ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ sems can ni mi byed/ rnam par mi
301b6(nyi khri): byed| mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang /
301b7(nyi khri): tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba bo ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ rmi lam ni mi
302a1(nyi khri): byed| rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs
302a2(nyi khri): brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
302a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
302a4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/
302a5(nyi khri): mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do/ /rab 'byor/
302a6(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub
302a7(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
302b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
302b2(nyi khri): dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de
302b3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon
302b4(nyi khri): par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi
302b5(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
302b6(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
302b7(nyi khri): byang chub ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam
303a1(nyi khri): par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams
303a2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i
303a3(nyi khri): sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos
303a4(nyi khri): pa ni/ go cha med pa'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/
303a5(nyi khri): gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ tshe
303a6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
303a7(nyi khri): shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
303b1(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/ de ltar ma
303b2(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma
303b3(nyi khri): grol ba'o/ /gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /gang 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang /
303b4(nyi khri): mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /gang 'di sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
303b5(nyi khri): dang | 'du byed dang / sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /'das pa'i tshor ba dang /
303b6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba
303b7(nyi khri): dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /da ltar byung ba'i
304a1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzugs med
304a2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang
304a3(nyi khri): ldan pa gang po/ gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma
304a4(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
304a5(nyi khri): ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
304a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
304a7(nyi khri): dang | 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor
304b1(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang pho/ 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /'jig rten pa'i tshor ba

304b3(nyi khri): las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma
304b4(nyi khri): grol ba'o/ /zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ zag pa med pa'i gzugs ni ma

305a1(nyi khri): ba'o| |gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir/

305a3(nyi khri): ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

305a6(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
305a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ nang stong pa
305b1(nyi khri): nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma
305b2(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ med pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol
305b3(nyi khri): ba'o| |med pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /med pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa

305b5(nyi khri): du ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
305b6(nyi khri): bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol
305b7(nyi khri): ba'o| |ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
306a1(nyi khri): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma
306a2(nyi khri): bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du
306a3(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes

306a6(nyi khri): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol
306a7(nyi khri): pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /
306b1(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ 'dus
306b2(nyi khri): ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma skyes pa'i phyir ma

306b4(nyi khri): phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

306b6(nyi khri): ba'o| |sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
306b7(nyi khri): kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o/ /de ma bcings ma
307a1(nyi khri): grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
307a2(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas/
307a3(nyi khri): ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas/ ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma
