334a7(nyi khri): chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab
334b1(nyi khri): 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i
334b2(nyi khri): tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ de
334b3(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i
334b4(nyi khri): phyir| de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas
334b5(nyi khri): pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /
334b6(nyi khri): sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs te/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub
334b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
335a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la
335a2(nyi khri): gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo/ /brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/
335a3(nyi khri): 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo/ /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa 'a rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
335a4(nyi khri): dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom mo/ /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan
335a5(nyi khri): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di yang de mi
335a6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di
335a7(nyi khri): ltar dbang po lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor/
335b1(nyi khri): 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
335b2(nyi khri): chen po ni/ 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ rab 'byor/
335b3(nyi khri): 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa
335b4(nyi khri): chen po ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog
335b5(nyi khri): pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/ yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang
335b6(nyi khri): chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang
335b7(nyi khri): snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/ yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
336a1(nyi khri): gyis bsgom ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
336a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ de'ang gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la
336a3(nyi khri): gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/ yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i
336a4(nyi khri): las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba
336a5(nyi khri): la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa rnam par spong bas/ yongs su grub pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
336a6(nyi khri): theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar/ ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting
336a7(nyi khri): nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid
336b1(nyi khri): du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma
336b2(nyi khri): med par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad
336b3(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med do zhes mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i
336b4(nyi khri): sgo gsum po de dag la zhum pa med par dran par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan
336b5(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa
336b6(nyi khri): shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang / sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug
336b7(nyi khri): bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal mi skye bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'gog
337a1(nyi khri): par shes pa'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o/ /de la zad pa shes ba gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
337a2(nyi khri): gti mug zad par shes pa'o/ /de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skye ba med par shes pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing
337a3(nyi khri): shes pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang
337a4(nyi khri): zhe na| sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi sems sems kyis shes pa'o/ /de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis lam shes pa dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o//
337a5(nyi khri): de la sgra ji bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor/ 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems
337a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum
337a7(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs
337b1(nyi khri): su ma shes par yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po
337b2(nyi khri): dang | dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang
337b3(nyi khri): po'o| |de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa yongs su shes par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang /
337b4(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/ /de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag mi slob pa dgra
337b5(nyi khri): bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge
337b6(nyi khri): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di 'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang
337b7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/
338a1(nyi khri): gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing
338a2(nyi khri): dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
338a3(nyi khri): 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la
338a4(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas pa 'di ni/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam
338a5(nyi khri): gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa med pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
338a6(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched
338a7(nyi khri): dang | 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor/
338b1(nyi khri): 'di'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni
338b2(nyi khri): 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong
338b3(nyi khri): pa rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor/
338b4(nyi khri): 'di'ang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
338b5(nyi khri): po ni| 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
338b6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu ste/ de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben/ sdig to
338b7(nyi khri): mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de
339a1(nyi khri): rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
339a2(nyi khri): las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du
339a3(nyi khri): btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med
339a4(nyi khri): pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med
339a5(nyi khri): sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni bsam
339a6(nyi khri): gtan bzhi pa'o/ /de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa
339a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
339b1(nyi khri): rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod do/ /snying rje dang
339b2(nyi khri): ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa
339b3(nyi khri): med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas
339b4(nyi khri): shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod de/ de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi'o/ /de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems
339b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
339b6(nyi khri): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam
339b7(nyi khri): pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas
340a1(nyi khri): so| |de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs
340a2(nyi khri): te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dag ni
340a3(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang
340a4(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /
340a5(nyi khri): de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam
340a6(nyi khri): mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
340a7(nyi khri): 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so/ /zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las
340b1(nyi khri): yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das
340b2(nyi khri): te| 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes
340b3(nyi khri): dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
340b4(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/
340b5(nyi khri): rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par
340b6(nyi khri): spyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan
340b7(nyi khri): gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags
341a1(nyi khri): pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
341a2(nyi khri): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/

341a4(nyi khri): pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
