429b4(nyi khri): nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
429b5(nyi khri): gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid ni gang
429b6(nyi khri): nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro
429b7(nyi khri): ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
430a1(nyi khri): gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bsam
430a2(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
430a3(nyi khri): gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar
430a4(nyi khri): yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang
430a5(nyi khri): gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
430a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
430a7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang
430b1(nyi khri): 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par
430b2(nyi khri): 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas
430b3(nyi khri): par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'dus
430b4(nyi khri): ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
430b5(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba'ang med/ 'gro
430b6(nyi khri): ba'ang med/ gnas pa'ang med do/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs
430b7(nyi khri): te| 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ theg pa chen po zhes bya'o zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
431a1(nyi khri): mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i
431a2(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /de ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar
431a3(nyi khri): byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' yang
431a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba med do/ /gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/
431a5(nyi khri): dgu'am/ bcu zhes bya ba med do/ /tha dad ces bya ba med do/ /de lta bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/ de la mnyam pa
431a6(nyi khri): dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /de la 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang / gti
431a7(nyi khri): mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /ming dang / ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyang mi dmigs so/ /dge ba dang / mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /kha na
431b1(nyi khri): ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'ang
431b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /skye ba dang / 'gag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang mi
431b3(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /de la rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang / bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang /
431b4(nyi khri): ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang
431b5(nyi khri): dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /'khor ba dang / mya ngan las
431b6(nyi khri): 'das ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor/
431b7(nyi khri): 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs
432a1(nyi khri): pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs
432a2(nyi khri): pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
432a3(nyi khri): byed dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong
432a4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /
432a5(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid
432a6(nyi khri): la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med
432a7(nyi khri): de| stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i
432b1(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong
432b2(nyi khri): pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su
432b3(nyi khri): med do/ /stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung
432b4(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ /stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
432b5(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin
432b6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
432b7(nyi khri): dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
433a1(nyi khri): dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma
433a2(nyi khri): 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
433a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar
433a4(nyi khri): mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
433a5(nyi khri): 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid
433a6(nyi khri): kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
433a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
433b1(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la
433b2(nyi khri): da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
433b3(nyi khri): dang | da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
433b4(nyi khri): nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi
433b5(nyi khri): dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
433b6(nyi khri): mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus
433b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
434a1(nyi khri): rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
434a2(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam
434a3(nyi khri): pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ yang
434a4(nyi khri): dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni
434a5(nyi khri): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung par mi dmigs/ 'phags
434a6(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
434a7(nyi khri): pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci
434b1(nyi khri): zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
434b2(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
434b3(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
434b4(nyi khri): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar
434b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de
434b6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam
434b7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
435a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor/ gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi
435a2(nyi khri): dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar
435a3(nyi khri): mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
435a4(nyi khri): sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs
435a5(nyi khri): rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
435a6(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/
435a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol
435b1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar
435b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs
435b3(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslabs shing /
435b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya
435b5(nyi khri): ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
435b6(nyi khri): ngo| |de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
435b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs
436a1(nyi khri): shing / 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das/
436a2(nyi khri): ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
436a3(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
436a4(nyi khri): po mchis pa rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam
436a5(nyi khri): pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
436a6(nyi khri): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung
436a7(nyi khri): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par 'gyur to/ /brnyes so/ /brnyes par 'gyur ro//
436b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
436b2(nyi khri): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad
436b3(nyi khri): du bsgo ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
436b4(nyi khri): bdag cag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar gyur pa
436b5(nyi khri): med de/ rab 'byor/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang
436b6(nyi khri): rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
436b7(nyi khri): pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus
437a1(nyi khri): shing khongs su chud pa de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
437a2(nyi khri): de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
437a3(nyi khri): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i
437a4(nyi khri): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
437a5(nyi khri): par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
437a6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
437a7(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
437b1(nyi khri): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang
437b2(nyi khri): snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'du zhing khongs su chung par 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi chos
437b3(nyi khri): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab
437b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
437b5(nyi khri): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa
437b6(nyi khri): dang | 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg
437b7(nyi khri): pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna
438a1(nyi khri): ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang /
438a2(nyi khri): sna'i rnam par shas pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin
438a3(nyi khri): pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa
438a4(nyi khri): dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
438a5(nyi khri): yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
438a6(nyi khri): tshor ba gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred
438a7(nyi khri): pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod
438b1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa
438b2(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye
438b3(nyi khri): bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams
438b4(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / bsam
438b5(nyi khri): gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad med pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang /
438b6(nyi khri): zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
438b7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
439a1(nyi khri): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
439a2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs
439a3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa
439a4(nyi khri): dang / dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten
439a5(nyi khri): pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
439a6(nyi khri): pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
439a7(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang
439b1(nyi khri): ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs
439b2(nyi khri): 'dis na/ khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes
439b3(nyi khri): bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
439b4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba

439b6(nyi khri): med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang
439b7(nyi khri): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nyer bar bzhag
440a1(nyi khri): pa rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
440a2(nyi khri): dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg
440a3(nyi khri): pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i
440a4(nyi khri): lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med
440a5(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
440a6(nyi khri): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar
440a7(nyi khri): na theg pa chen po dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan/ mi 'jigs
440b1(nyi khri): pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'ang
440b2(nyi khri): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
440b3(nyi khri): pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar yang byang
440b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su mi dmigs te/ gzugs kun
440b5(nyi khri): tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas
440b6(nyi khri): pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba
440b7(nyi khri): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis byang
441a1(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems
441a2(nyi khri): dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs
441a3(nyi khri): na| byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming
441a4(nyi khri): tsam du bas te/ bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi'ang bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang
441a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang / byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs
441a6(nyi khri): lta'ang ga la zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa lta'ang ga la zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mngon par ma
441a7(nyi khri): grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de lta lags
441b1(nyi khri): la/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis na mngon par ma grub pa mngon par ma
441b2(nyi khri): grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams te mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ yongs su mi
441b3(nyi khri): 'jum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
441b4(nyi khri): la spyod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa'
441b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmigs su med pa yin/ dbus su dmigs su med pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i
441b6(nyi khri): phyir na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
441b7(nyi khri): shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems
442a1(nyi khri): dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes
442a2(nyi khri): bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams
442a3(nyi khri): cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su
442a4(nyi khri): bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril gyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmigs na /
442a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i
442a6(nyi khri): phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/
442a7(nyi khri): de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba'ang / bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'
442b1(nyi khri): zhes bgyi ba'ang / byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzugs mngon par grub pa
442b2(nyi khri): lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta'ang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs
442b3(nyi khri): ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir na/ de
442b4(nyi khri): skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'am zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i
442b5(nyi khri): phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
442b6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'jum/ yongs su mi 'jum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / yid
442b7(nyi khri): mi 'jigs/ mi dngangs/ skrag par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa
443a1(nyi khri): dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i
443a2(nyi khri): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
443a3(nyi khri): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa
443a4(nyi khri): dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can
443a5(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
443a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang /
443a7(nyi khri): sems can rang bzhin med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so/ /dbus su mi dmigs so/ /sems can med pa'ang gzhan/ sems can
443b1(nyi khri): stong pa'ang gzhan/ sems can dben pa'ang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin med pa'ang gzhan zhig yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
443b2(nyi khri): gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sems can med pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa
443b3(nyi khri): dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
443b4(nyi khri): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
443b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang
443b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
443b7(nyi khri): so| |gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
444a1(nyi khri): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
444a2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
444a3(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid
444a4(nyi khri): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
444a5(nyi khri): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
444a6(nyi khri): dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du
444a7(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
444b1(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
444b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dben
444b3(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
444b4(nyi khri): so| |gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
444b5(nyi khri): dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang
444b6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / gzugs dang / tshor ba
444b7(nyi khri): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
445a1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
445a2(nyi khri): yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzugs dang /
445a3(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
445a4(nyi khri): pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
445a5(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing
445a6(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir/
445a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
445b1(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
445b2(nyi khri): par 'byung ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
445b3(nyi khri): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /skye
445b4(nyi khri): mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
445b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
445b6(nyi khri): su mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
445b7(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i
446a1(nyi khri): mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo
446a2(nyi khri): bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin
446a3(nyi khri): no| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin
446a4(nyi khri): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de
446a5(nyi khri): gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
446a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med
446a7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /
446b1(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
446b2(nyi khri): phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
446b3(nyi khri): so| |tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
446b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
446b5(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
446b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
446b7(nyi khri): mi dmigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
447a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems

448a1(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
448a2(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
448a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus

448b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
448b2(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
448b3(nyi khri): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong
448b4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar

448b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
448b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
449a1(nyi khri): so| |dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
449a2(nyi khri): kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
449a3(nyi khri): dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
449a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
449a5(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
449a6(nyi khri): so| |dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
449a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa
449b1(nyi khri): nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs
449b2(nyi khri): so| |nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
449b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa
449b4(nyi khri): nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
449b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
449b6(nyi khri): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du
449b7(nyi khri): med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
450a1(nyi khri): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
450a2(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
450a3(nyi khri): dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas
450a4(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu
450a5(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa
450a6(nyi khri): nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs
450a7(nyi khri): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
450b1(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge
450b2(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
450b3(nyi khri): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
450b4(nyi khri): rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms

450b6(nyi khri): shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i
450b7(nyi khri): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par
451a1(nyi khri): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam

451a4(nyi khri): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub

453b3(nyi khri): so| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi

454a1(nyi khri): dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam

454a5(nyi khri): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar
454a6(nyi khri): du med pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
454a7(nyi khri): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
454b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi

455b2(nyi khri): kyi dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/
455b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam
455b4(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo
455b5(nyi khri): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chos kyi dbyings med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'
455b6(nyi khri): dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa
455b7(nyi khri): nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/
456a1(nyi khri): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chos kyi dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
456a2(nyi khri): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang /
456a3(nyi khri): dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin
456a4(nyi khri): pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
456a5(nyi khri): so| |nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
456a6(nyi khri): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos med pa'i phyir/ byang
456a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
456b1(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos med pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/
456b2(nyi khri): dbus mi dmigs te/ nyan thos med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
456b3(nyi khri): gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nyan thos med pa gang yin pa dang / stong
456b4(nyi khri): pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus
456b5(nyi khri): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
456b6(nyi khri): gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas
456b7(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
457a1(nyi khri): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang /
457a2(nyi khri): dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang sangs rgyas med pa dang / rang
457a3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/
457a4(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
457a5(nyi khri): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang sangs rgyas med pa gang

457a7(nyi khri): ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag

463b7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/
464a1(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa
464a2(nyi khri): ni| mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ lce'i
464a3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /
464a4(nyi khri): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus
464a5(nyi khri): te reg pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
464a6(nyi khri): ni| mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang /

464b1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg
464b2(nyi khri): pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor

464b4(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor

464b6(nyi khri): med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
464b7(nyi khri): tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
465a1(nyi khri): dang | rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
465a2(nyi khri): ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa
465a3(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la

465b1(nyi khri): so| |mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las
465b2(nyi khri): byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
465b3(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
465b4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
465b5(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
465b6(nyi khri): pa dang | bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
465b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang /
466a1(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ dngos
466a2(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
466a3(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med
466a4(nyi khri): cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ni/ yang dag par spong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam gyi bar ni lam gyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lam ni dran pa nye bar
466a5(nyi khri): bzhag pa dang / yang dag bar spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
466a6(nyi khri): ni| 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni/ bsam gtan rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi bar
466a7(nyi khri): ni| gzungs kyi sgo rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
466b1(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
466b2(nyi khri): shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin
466b3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la
466b4(nyi khri): med cing mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la
466b5(nyi khri): med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos ni/ rigs kyi sa'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos ni/ brgyad pa'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom
466b6(nyi khri): pa'i bar gyi chos ni/ dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i chos ni/ rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos dang /
466b7(nyi khri): lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so skye bo'i sa ni rigs
467a1(nyi khri): kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la med cing mi dmigs
467a2(nyi khri): so| |yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang
467a3(nyi khri): bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa
467a4(nyi khri): nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni/ rnam pa thams
467a5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
467a6(nyi khri): rgyun du zhugs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar ni de
467a7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs
467b1(nyi khri): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha
467b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ byang chub
467b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams shing rjes
467b4(nyi khri): su bstan pa ni/ gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med
467b5(nyi khri): cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na chos thams cad med cing dmigs su med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' med cing dmigs su med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
467b6(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
467b7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes
468a1(nyi khri): bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/
468a2(nyi khri): 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro /gang na'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/
468a3(nyi khri): 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang
468a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ skye mched ces bya ba dang / khams zhes bya ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
468a5(nyi khri): ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar ming ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro /gang du'ang mi gnas so/ /ming tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ skye
468a6(nyi khri): mched ma yin/ khams ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma
468a7(nyi khri): yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
468b1(nyi khri): pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol
468b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
468b3(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang
468b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
468b5(nyi khri): pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang nang
468b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid med/ nang stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i
468b7(nyi khri): phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar 'di ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
469a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid med/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
469a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs
469a3(nyi khri): des na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur
469a4(nyi khri): du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang /
469a5(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa
469a6(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
469a7(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
469b1(nyi khri): la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/
469b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
469b3(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
469b4(nyi khri): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
469b5(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
469b6(nyi khri): med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang
469b7(nyi khri): med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba
470a1(nyi khri): 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ ming la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang ming med do/ /
470a2(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang med cing mi dmigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
470a3(nyi khri): dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du/ 'di ltar bdag bdag ces bya ste/ bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub bo/ /'di lta ste/ sems
470a4(nyi khri): can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba
470a5(nyi khri): po mthong ba po zhes bya ste/ mthong ba po shin tu mngon par ma grub bo zhes/ ci'i phyir de skad ces smras zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bdag shin tu med cing mi dmigs
470a6(nyi khri): na| de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mthong ba po'i bar du shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gzugs shin tu med
470a7(nyi khri): cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par
470b1(nyi khri): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mig shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid shin tu med cing
470b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gzugs shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg
470b3(nyi khri): dang | chos shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mig gi rnam par shes pa shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur
470b4(nyi khri): ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu med
470b5(nyi khri): cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i
470b6(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par
470b7(nyi khri): 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
471a1(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung pa'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te
471a2(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sa'i khams shin
471a3(nyi khri): tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par
471a4(nyi khri): shes pa'i khams shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ma rig pa shin tu med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur
