522a7(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa
522b1(nyi khri): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ba ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni
522b2(nyi khri): rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
522b3(nyi khri): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi
522b4(nyi khri): gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/
522b5(nyi khri): phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
522b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyan gyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/
522b7(nyi khri): de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang
523a1(nyi khri): mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang /
523a2(nyi khri): rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par
523a3(nyi khri): yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs
523a4(nyi khri): so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang /
523a5(nyi khri): srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
523a6(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
523a7(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
523b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
523b2(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po
523b3(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
523b4(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan
523b5(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
523b6(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
523b7(nyi khri): rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
524a1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs
524a2(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin
524a3(nyi khri): gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
524a4(nyi khri): ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos
524a5(nyi khri): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi gnas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas/ de ltar
524a6(nyi khri): gzugs yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnams shes pa yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
524a7(nyi khri): yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
524b1(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
524b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
524b3(nyi khri): dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /
524b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su spyad par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji
524b5(nyi khri): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi lam yongs su spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
524b6(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
524b7(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do/ /smras pa/ tshe
525a1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang / rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
525a2(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byed cing / sbyin bdag tu gyur pa dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / phongs pa dang / ltogs pa dang / 'dron pa
525a3(nyi khri): dang | slong ba zas 'dod pa la ni zas/ skom dang / theg pa dang / gos dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gnas dang / mal stan dang / yo byad dang / sman
525a4(nyi khri): dang | mi'i yo byad gzhan gang ci'ang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/ bu pho 'dod pa la ni bu pho yongs su gtong / bu mo 'dod pa la ni bu mo/ chung ma 'dod pa la ni chung ma/ rgyal
525a5(nyi khri): srid 'dod pa la ni rgyal srid/ mgo 'dod pa la ni mgo /yan lag dang nyid lag 'dod pa la ni yan lag dang nying lag /sha dang khrag dang rkang 'dod pa la ni sha dang khrag dang
525a6(nyi khri): rkang yongs su gtong ste/ de'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong la/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni yongs su gtong pa'o/ /'di ni len pa'o/ /'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /bdag ni ser sna med pa'o//
525a7(nyi khri): bdag ni sbyin pa'i bdag po'o/ /bdag ni bdog pa thams cad gtong ba'o/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa'o/ /bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o
525b1(nyi khri): zhes zer te/ sbyin pa de byin nas kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / bdag
525b2(nyi khri): gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di nyid la bde ba dang nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig / ces yongs su bsngo ste/ de chags pa
525b3(nyi khri): gsum la chags shing / sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ngo / /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa 'di gsum
525b4(nyi khri): la chags nas/ sbyin pa de dag yongs su gtong ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di
525b5(nyi khri): ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
525b6(nyi khri): gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
525b7(nyi khri): po sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ len pa mi dmigs/ sbyin pa mi dmigs/ rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ni
526a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
526a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
526a3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
526a4(nyi khri): pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig
526a5(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
526a6(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod de/ de la
526a7(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung zhing / de yang
526b1(nyi khri): gnas pas bsrung ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /'di ni tshul khrims so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do/ /zhes bya ba
526b2(nyi khri): nas| de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / tshul khrims su 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di dag gsum zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing / tshul khrims
526b3(nyi khri): bsrung ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi
526b4(nyi khri): g.yo mi 'phags mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/
526b5(nyi khri): de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems
526b6(nyi khri): can mi dmigs/ tshul khrims mi dmigs/ rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed cing tshul khrims de'ang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs
526b7(nyi khri): par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
527a1(nyi khri): pa zhes bya ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i bzod
527a2(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa bsgom zhing / de'ang gnas pas bsgom ste/ de 'di snyam
527a3(nyi khri): du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa bsgom mo/ /'di ni bzod pa'o/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do/ /zhes bya ba nas/ de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa
527a4(nyi khri): dang | gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / bzod par 'du shes dang / chags pa 'di gsum zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing bzod pa bsgom ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu
527a5(nyi khri): phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags mi 'da' pas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes
527a6(nyi khri): bya'o| |de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe
527a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa bsgom pa'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ bzod pa mi dmigs/ rnam
527b1(nyi khri): par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed cing / bzod pa de'ang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
527b2(nyi khri): bsngo zhing mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags
527b3(nyi khri): la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
527b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom zhing / de'ang gnas pas rtsom ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /'di ni lus so/ /'di
527b5(nyi khri): sems so/ /'di ni brtson 'grus so/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin du byed do/ /zhes bya ba nas/ de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / brtson
527b6(nyi khri): 'grus su 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de
527b7(nyi khri): ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /de la
528a1(nyi khri): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs
528a2(nyi khri): su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs
528a3(nyi khri): brtson 'grus mi dmigs/ rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par
528a4(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
528a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten pa'i bsam
528a6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug cing / de'ang
528a7(nyi khri): gnas pas snyoms par 'jug ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go /'di ni bsam gtan no/ /bdag ni
528b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do/ /zhes bya ba nas/ de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan du 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum
528b2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug ste/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i
528b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las
528b4(nyi khri): 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa ste/ de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
528b5(nyi khri): ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ bsam gtan mi
528b6(nyi khri): dmigs| rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed cing / bsam gtan de'ang sems can thams cad la gtong ste/ sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang
528b7(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
529a1(nyi khri): zhes bya ste/ 'di ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten
529a2(nyi khri): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab bsgom zhing / de'ang gnas pas
529a3(nyi khri): bsgom ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab bsgom mo/ /'di ni shes rab bo/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed do/ /zhes bya ba nas/
529a4(nyi khri): de 'di ltar bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / shes rab tu 'du shes pa dang / chags pa 'di gsum zhes bya ba'i bar la chags shing / shes rab bsgom
529a5(nyi khri): ste| 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo
529a6(nyi khri): mi 'phags mi 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa
529a7(nyi khri): ste| de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
529b1(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ bdag mi dmigs/ sems can mi dmigs/ shes rab mi dmigs/ rnam par smin pa la'ang dga' bar mi byed cing / shes rab de'ang sems can thams cad la gtong
529b2(nyi khri): ste| sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo zhing / mtshan ma cung zad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni/ 'jig
529b3(nyi khri): rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ de ni 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' bas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe
529b4(nyi khri): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang
529b5(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
529b6(nyi khri): phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
529b7(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
530a1(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
530a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni
530a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
530a4(nyi khri): byang chub kyi lam mo/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
530a5(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
530a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
530a7(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
530b1(nyi khri): kyi sgo thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi
530b2(nyi khri): lam mo/ /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni byang chub sems dpa'
530b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam mo/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ /legs so/ /legs so/ /byang chub kyi lam 'di pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi mthu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras
530b4(nyi khri): pa| tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos
530b5(nyi khri): kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad bskyed pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi
530b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su sdud cing yang
530b7(nyi khri): dag par sdud pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
531a1(nyi khri): 'di la spyad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma byon pa'i de
531a2(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
531a3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
531a4(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
531a5(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem
531a6(nyi khri): nur ram/ rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can

531b5(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/ /sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa dngos po med par rig par bya'o/ /sems can rang
531b6(nyi khri): bzhin med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa rang bzhin med par rig par bya'o/ /sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sems can dben pa'i phyir yid la byed
531b7(nyi khri): pa dben par rig par bya'o/ /sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i

536a7(nyi khri): 'byor gyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/ / //de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
536b1(nyi khri): thams cad kyang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin ji snyed

536b3(nyi khri): mtshe ma ji snyed yod pa dang / lha'i bu rab dga' ldan ji snyed yod pa dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' ji snyed yod pa dang / lha'i bu rab gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ji snyed yod pa de dag thams

536b6(nyi khri): lha'i bu ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi las kyi
536b7(nyi khri): rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
537a1(nyi khri): byed kyi lha dang / tshangs ris kyi lha dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha dang / dge rgyas kyi lha dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi las
537a2(nyi khri): kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar ma song / stong gi char yang nye bar
537a3(nyi khri): ma song / brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma song / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar ma song / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dper yang ma bzod do/ 'di lta ste/ dper
537a4(nyi khri): na| 'dzam bu na da'i gser gyi drung na/ lcags nag po'am/ mgal dum lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od
537a5(nyi khri): kyi drung na/ lha'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i 'od de dag thams cad lha ma me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od 'ba' zhig de dag
537a6(nyi khri): gi nang na dam par snang ngo / /gtso bor snang ngo / /gya nom par snang ngo / /'phags par snang ngo / /mchog tu snang ngo / /rab tu snang ngo / /phul du snang ngo / /bla na med par snang ngo / gong na
537a7(nyi khri): med par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
537b1(nyi khri): gyi khams na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / mtshe ma'i lha dang / dga' ldan gyi lha dang / 'phrul dga'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang /
537b2(nyi khri): tshangs ris kyi lha dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan la bab par bstan pa thos par 'dod nas/ chos nyan par
537b3(nyi khri): 'dod pa'i phyir lhags na/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
537b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe
537b5(nyi khri): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po nyi shu bdun pa/
537b6(nyi khri): kau shi ka /de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gyis shig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
537b7(nyi khri): rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar bslab par bya ba
538a1(nyi khri): dang | lha'i bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyes pa de dag gis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
538a2(nyi khri): byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba bstan par bya'o/ /gang yang dag par skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
538a3(nyi khri): pa'i mthu med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'i phyir te/ 'on kyang gal te de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
538a4(nyi khri): bskyed na de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang ngo / /khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur bas/ de dag gis dge ba'i phyogs la bdag
538a5(nyi khri): ni bar chad mi byed do/ /kau shi ka /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ kau shi ka/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
538a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /gzugs ni sdug bsngal ba
538a7(nyi khri): dang | bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / na ba dang / dgra dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / 'jig
538b1(nyi khri): pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi med pa dang / yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / gnod par yid la bya'o/ /rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
538b2(nyi khri): sems bskyed pas/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag
538b3(nyi khri): med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / na ba dang / dgra dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'jigs pa
538b4(nyi khri): dang | 'go ba'i nad dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi med pa dang / yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / gnod par yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
538b5(nyi khri): pas| de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /mig ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang /
538b6(nyi khri): sdig pa dang / na ba dang / dgra dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi med pa dang / yid
538b7(nyi khri): brtan du mi rung pa dang / gnod par yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang
539a1(nyi khri): yid ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /yid ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / sdig

539a5(nyi khri): chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi med pa dang / yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / gnod par yid la bya'o//
539a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /chos ni sdug
539a7(nyi khri): bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / na ba dang / dgra dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang /

539b2(nyi khri): pa'i sems bskyed pas/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang /

539b4(nyi khri): dang | bdag gi med pa dang / yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / gnod par yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rna
539b5(nyi khri): ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /yid kyi rnam
539b6(nyi khri): par shes pa ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / na ba dang / dgra dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang /

540a1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg

540b1(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu

541a4(nyi khri): nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang /

541a7(nyi khri): tshul gyis/ ma rig pa ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /ma rig pa ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa
541b1(nyi khri): pa dang / na ba dang / dgra dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / 'jig pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / stong pa nyid dang / bdag gi med pa dang / yid brtan du mi
541b2(nyi khri): rung ba dang / gnod par yid la bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming
541b3(nyi khri): dang | gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mi rtag par yid la bya'o/ /rga shi ni sdug bsngal ba
